mapper.sql: driver_order_id, driver_order_code, driver_id, passenger_order_code, create_time, end_time, opinion, rating, driver_order_state, flag,tb_parm_id,rating_state,rating_time
mapper.select:
select
from tb_driver_order where driver_id = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND driver_order_state = "0"
select passenger_order_code from tb_driver_order where driver_id = #{driverCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND flag = "0"
mapper.insert: insert into tb_driver_order (driver_order_id, driver_order_code, driver_id, passenger_order_code, create_time, end_time, opinion, rating, driver_order_state, flag,rating_state) values (#{driverOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passengerOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverOrderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ratingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

driver_order_id,

driver_id,

end_time,
opinion,

mapper.update:
update tb_driver_order
driver_order_code = #{driverOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passenger_order_code = #{passengerOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_order_state = #{driverOrderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rating_state = #{ratingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where driver_order_id = #{driverOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_driver_order set driver_order_code = #{driverOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passenger_order_code = #{passengerOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating_state = #{ratingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, driver_order_state = #{driverOrderState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where driver_order_id = #{driverOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_driver_order set opinion = #{opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating_state = "1", rating_time = now() where passenger_order_code = #{passengerOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, order_code, order_number, user_code, start_address, end_address, km, price, people_number, appointment_time, creat_time, update_time, flag, order_state, start_longitude, start_latitude, end_longitude, end_latitude, end_about, tb_parm_id, goods_name, goods_details FROM tb_passenger_order WHERE flag = 0 AND end_about = #{endAbout} AND order_state = #{orderState} AND tb_parm_id =#{tbParmId} ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT order_id, order_code, order_number, user_code, start_address, end_address, km, price, people_number, appointment_time, creat_time, update_time, flag, order_state, start_longitude, start_latitude, end_longitude, end_latitude, end_about, tb_parm_id, goods_name, goods_details FROM tb_passenger_order WHERE flag = 0 AND end_about = #{endAbout} AND order_state = #{orderState} AND tb_parm_id =#{tbParmId} AND bus_route = ( select tb_regular_bus.regular_bus_route from tb_regular_bus where flag = "0" AND regular_bus_number = #{carNumber} ) ORDER BY update_time DESC

SELECT driver_order_id, driver_order_code, driver_id, passenger_order_code, create_time, end_time, opinion, rating, rating_state, driver_order_state, flag, tb_parm_id FROM tb_driver_order WHERE flag = 0 AND driver_order_code =#{driverOrderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT driver_order_id, driver_order_code, driver_id, passenger_order_code, create_time, end_time, opinion, rating, rating_state, driver_order_state, flag FROM tb_driver_order WHERE flag = 0 AND driver_id = #{driverId} AND driver_order_state = #{driverOrderState} ORDER BY create_time DESC
